table.name: crm_uf_form
table.comment: User framework forms. Each record represents a form which encompasses a set of fields defined in crm_uf_form_fields table. Initially will be used for User Sharing form(s). Subsequently we anticipate using this to define other public facing forms (e.g. online donation solicitation forms, mailing list preferences, etc.).

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this form currently active? If false, hide all related fields for all sharing contexts.
